history.proof: intros f g x Hf Hg. destruct Hf as [lf Hf]. destruct Hg as [lg Hg]. qsimpl time: 1 use: ex_derive_opp. qsimpl time: 1 use: ex_derive_opp. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_derive_plus,ex_derive_opp. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_derive_plus,ex_derive_opp. exists (plus lf lg). hauto l: on depth: 3use: is_derive_plus, ex_derive_opp.

ctx: intros f g x Hf Hg.
exceptions.tactic: apply ex_derive_opp in Hf as Hexf.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (f0 : ?K -> ?V) (x0 : ?K), ex_derive f0 x0 -> ex_derive (fun x1 : ?K => opp (f0 x1)) x0" on hypothesis of type "is_derive f x lf".

ctx: intros f g x Hf Hg.
exceptions.tactic: apply ex_derive_opp in Hg as Hexg.

ctx: intros f g x Hf Hg.
intros f g x Hf Hg.
intros f g x Hf Hg.
exceptions.exn: The reference Hexf was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros f g x Hf Hg.
exceptions.exn: The reference Hexg was not found in the current environment.

original: intros f g x Hf Hg. destruct Hf as [lf Hf]. destruct Hg as [lg Hg]. apply ex_derive_opp in Hf as Hexf. apply ex_derive_opp in Hg as Hexg. apply is_derive_plus in Hexf. apply is_derive_plus in Hexg. exists (plus lf lg). apply Hexf. apply Hexg.
